Dear Champagne Lover,
We have partnered with some of the most prestigious restaurants of Singapore to provide exclusive and memorable gastronomy experiences, featuring our most delightful and rarest champagnes.
As a faithful friend of our house, we are happy to introduce you the first three dinners in avant-premiere.
Select your favourite on mypjexperience.sg:
ZAFFERANO
thursday 27th april
Zafferano is a vibrant all-occasion destination that exudes inviting warmth and sophistication. The wishes for sparkles and dreams of briny gems will be realised during one exceptional night.
On Thursday 27 April, luxuriate in the Caviar and Champagne pairing dinner meticulously curated by Chef Marco Guccio, and supported by Russian House of Caviar and Champagne Perrier-Jouët.
$178++ per person
For limited seats only, enjoy a special price of $148++ per person for early reservation.
Book Now <[[http://marketing.pernod-ricard-asia.com/SGP_BRD_PJ_1704_MyPJ_ZAFFERANO_Page---Registration.html]]>
THE KITCHEN
AT BACCHANALIA
thursday 4th may
The Kitchen at Bacchanalia presents an intimate cuisine inspired by the world. The menu is a reflection of Head-Chef Luke's devotion to the preparation of fine food from quality product A masterful mixture of sophistication and simplicity, enhanced by rich flavours.
Come and experience the perfect marriage between Perrier-Jouët and the talent of the Chef.
$278++ per person
Book Now <[[http://marketing.pernod-ricard-asia.com/SGP_BRD_PJ_1705_MyPJ_THE_KITCHEN_AT_BACCHANALIA_Page---Registration.html]]>
BUONA TERRA
thursday 25th may
Occupying the cosy extension of Chateau TCC, Buona Terra is conceptualised to preserve the exclusive and elegant ambience of the vintage colonial building.
Embark on a charming atmosphere for an unforgettable Italian gastronomic journey with Champagne Perrier-Jouët.
$148++ per person
Book Now <[[http://marketing.pernod-ricard-asia.com/SGP_BRD_PJ_1705_MyPJ_BUONATERRA_Page---Registration.html]]>
We are looking forward to meeting you at our next dinner.
Perrier-Jouët team
